org.artifactory.sapi.fs

Interface MutableVfsItem<T extends MutableItemInfo>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    VfsItem<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MutableVfsFile, MutableVfsFolder

    public interface MutableVfsItem<T extends MutableItemInfo>
extends VfsItem<T>
    The mutable additions for a virtual item.
    Author:
    Yossi Shaul

    • Method Detail

      • isNew

        boolean isNew()
        Returns:
        True if this item is new and doesn't exist in the database yet

      • delete

        boolean delete()
        Marks this for deletion on session save. After the session is saved all the deleted items are automatically unlocked and removed from the session.
        Returns:
        TODO: no need to return a value?

      • isDeleted

        boolean isDeleted()
        Returns:
        True is this item was deleted from the database. This only happens after the item is marked for deletion and the session is saved.

      • markError

        void markError()
        Marks the state of this item as in error. Items in error state should not be saved by the session manager. This should not be used occasionally, only in cases where on one hand we don't want to split a transaction to multiple small ones and on the other hand we don't want single failure to rollback the entire transaction.
